actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-455.
Motion to Consider Measure Failed to Receive 2/3's Vote by Yea-Nay Vote: 210 - 142 (Record Vote No:  480).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 3992) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend for a temporary period certain tax provisions which would otherwise expire at the end of 1985, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3992 (tax provision extensions).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 3992) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend for a temporary period certain tax provisions which would otherwise expire at the end of 1985, and for other purposes.
